metadata.title: CVE-2024-6600 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Due to large allocation checks in Angle for GLSL shaders being too lenientan out-of-bounds access could occur when allocating more than 8192 ints inprivate shader memory on mac OS. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 128and Firefox ESR < 115.13.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
